extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    [(FILM110 or FILM104 and FILM106) or FILM240 or FILM260) and a GPA of 2.60

basic.description: Intermediate study in an area of classical Hollywood cinema, through a selection of representative films. Examines industrial systems of production, distribution, and exhibition in the United States, the art of popular cinema, and relations to social setting.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Hollywood: The Dream Factory
